title: GotoTruus
body:
"Vriend! Luckily the SS did not catch you!"

 [[Give daffodils|Give daffodils]]

title: Give daffodils
body:
"Oh! Good! If we want to end the occupation of the Square we need to move quickly!

This document will set us free. My contact is waiting in front of the University Building."

 [[pick up declaration|pick up declaration button]]

title: pick up declaration button
body:
Truus van Lier's character sheet appears

Route to next location appears
